_header: Of my chamber he is and born in palatine
_description: Fragment of a poem on Sir Eger de Femyne — nine lines only

BLSl1212.First Lines:
…off my Chambyr he is and born in pallatyeI namyd tresgentyl
                    Eger de ffemenye…
BLSl1212.Last Lines:
…I me obmytte for in ȝoure obeysaunceI shall euere be
                    with oute disseueraunce
BLSl1212.Note: Nine lines as end of a longer piece(?), rhyming aabcbccdd.
